query.name: razdel1
query.script: select where ${executivebody} = '1' or ${executivebody} = '' or ${executivebody} is null

query.name: spec1
query.script: select row_number() over() as num, dor.name as name_org, case dep.LEVELSIGNIFICANCE when '1' then 'Федеральный орган исполнительной власти' when '2' then 'Орган исполнительной власти субъектов Российской Федерации' end as name_sub, trim(COALESCE(dor.settlement,'')||', ул. '||COALESCE(dor.street,'')||', д. '||COALESCE(dor.house,'')||', к. '||COALESCE(dor.housing,'')||', стр. '||COALESCE(dor.building,''),',') as adr_org from ORGANIZATION org inner join ORGANIZATIONDIR dor on dor.id = org.organizationdirid inner join DEPARTMENTDIR dep on dep.id = dor.departmentdirid where dep.LEVELSIGNIFICANCE = '1' and (dep.LEVELSIGNIFICANCE = ${executivebody} or ${executivebody} = '' or ${executivebody} is null) and (dep.id::text = ${departmentdirid} or ${departmentdirid} = '' or ${departmentdirid} is null) and (select count(*) from VACANCYORG vv where vv.ORGANIZATIONid = org.id and vv.yearconscription = ${organizationyear}::integer) > 0

'||COALESCE(dor.street,'')||', д. '||COALESCE(dor.house,'')||', к. '||COALESCE(dor.housing,'')||', стр. '||COALESCE(dor.building,''),',') as adr_org from ORGANIZATION org inner join ORGANIZATIONDIR dor on dor.id = org.organizationdirid inner join DEPARTMENTDIR dep on dep.id = dor.departmentdirid where dep.LEVELSIGNIFICANCE = '2' and (dep.LEVELSIGNIFICANCE = ${executivebody} or ${executivebody} = '' or ${executivebody} is null) and (dep.id::text = ${departmentdirid} or ${departmentdirid} = '' or ${departmentdirid} is null) and (select count(*) from VACANCYORG vv where vv.ORGANIZATIONid = org.id and vv.yearconscription = ${organizationyear}::integer) > 0
